name: The Fire in the Woods
description:
You are lost with your friends in the woods, and something is lurking in the darkness… Will you be able to survive the night and delay the inevitable?

Survive the night by keeping the fire alive, you will have to explore to find items that will help you to intensify the flames, and remember, the light keeps the shadows away.

KEYBOARD

WASD - Movment E - Grab/Drop Items

XBOX CONTROLLER

Left Joystick - Movment A - Grab/Drop Items


PROGRAMMING

Adrián Guevara Alonso

Pablo Martínez Urios

ART

Hermes Escrivá Serra
